page.title: 02Fashion In Thorpe Hesley
page.content: Fashion changes from month to month. Fashion is influenced by music,the trend towards fitness,being slim and muscularity. Money also affects fashion.Some clothing shops have had to close down.Clothing is made from natrual and man made materials.Animal rights campaigners believe that skins should not be used for clothing and they protest outside shops which sell the skins.You can no longer tell the difference between animal fur and man made fur.People like to belong to groups like Headbangers,Pringles,Punks and Mods.They use clothing to show people which group they belong to.Football supporters wear their teams colours and fans of pop groups wear similar clothing to the bands.We wear fashion because we like to look good and not be left out by looking old fashioned.
